results.name: Erroneous version of A103450.
comment: The triangle is bisymmetric, row sums = A045623: (1, 2, 5, 12, 28, 64,...). A114219(signed) * A007318 = A128255.
formula: T(n,k) = k Binomial[n-2,k-1] + Binomial[n-2,k-2], for 1 <= k <= n. - O. D'Antona, Dec 17 2007
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
Central coefficients T(2n,n) = A141222. - _Emanuele Munarini_, Jun 01 2012
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Feb 20 2007
ext: Typo in sequence corrected by O. D'Antona (dantona(AT)dico.unimi.it), Dec 17 2007
